title: My phone turns off when plugged in
content:
So my phone the other day started to turn off when I plugged it in. It does it on fast charge and regular charge. It does it on my Laptop and and just a charger. It does it on factory chargers and OEM chargers. Sometimes, it does not charge at all even once it has shut down. 

I have looks for any objects inside the port, and have blown it out with air. That has not made any change. The only way I can charge my phone is to pug it in, let it shut down and then turn it back on.
